query-mapping.description: The list of posts for the blog administrator.

query.name: storage-get-data
query.comment: Get the data content of the storage object.
query.sql: SELECT store.mime_type, store.create_date, store.name, store.uri, store.storage, data.data FROM awa_storage AS store LEFT JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = store.workspace_id AND acl.entity_type = $entity_type[awa_workspace] AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[storage-create] LEFT JOIN awa_storage_data AS data ON store.store_data_id = data.id WHERE store.id = :store_id AND (store.is_public OR acl.id IS NOT NULL)

query.name: storage-get-local
query.comment: Get the local data storage that can be used to read locally a storage object.
query.sql: INNER JOIN awa_storage AS store ON o.storage_id = store.id AND o.store_version = store.version LEFT JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = store.workspace_id AND acl.entity_type = $entity_type[awa_workspace] AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[storage-create] WHERE o.storage_id = :store_id AND o.shared = 1 AND (store.is_public OR acl.id IS NOT NULL)
